title: Oakley ARO3 LITE, Black, Medium
features: Engineered for those unforgiving climbs and blistering heat, ARO3 LITE is made with a lightweight polycarbonate shell and EPS protective foam, and built with optimized ventilation to help keep you cool.
Integrated eyewear dock to securely stow your shades and keep them handy for quick and easy access.
The BOA 360 FS1-1 fit system with TX1 Lace provides a soft textile feel and flexibility that lies flat against your head for seamless eyewear compatibility.
description: Engineered for those unforgiving climbs and blistering heat, ARO3 LITE is built with optimized ventilation to help keep you cool. • Designed for climbing. • Ventilation focused. • Eyewear Dock. • Lightweight polycarbonate shell. • EPS protective foam. • BOA® 360 Fit System. • 360-degree fit band. • X-Static® moisture wicking brow pad. • Unisex. • Three size options: Small (52-56cm), Medium (54-58cm) and Large (56-60cm). • Helmet carry bag included
